13 School Relations
MARION CORWELL. ASSOCIATE DIRECTOR
July 28, 1964
Miss Lee Keane
WD2T
Wayne- State University
Detroit 2, Michigan
Dear Lee:
It’s a pleasure.to welcome you to membership on the
I'TABB Public Relations Committee,
During the coming year we hope to prepare a Speaker's
Guide listing NAEB members who are prepared to speak on
educational broadcasting^- throughout the United States (on the
.order of the NAB Speakers' Guide which is listed according to
states).
If you know of anyone who you feel would do an outstanding-
job on the subject of educational broadcasting, would you please
jot down their names for inclusion in the Guide?
I'm looking forward to working with you.
All the best,
tOVV'*-' ■
Marion Corwell
Associate Director
